## What's Changed

* Remove NGINX modules and /jwt-token endpoint by @marians in https://github.com/giantswarm/happa/pull/4675
* Enable OCI pushing, simplify job names by @marians in https://github.com/giantswarm/happa/pull/4676
* Migrate Helm charts to new Chart.yaml annotations by @marians in https://github.com/giantswarm/happa/pull/4681, https://github.com/giantswarm/happa/pull/4682
* feat(helm): add Gateway API support by @weatherhog in https://github.com/giantswarm/happa/pull/4684
* NGINX config: Stricter argument check by @marians in https://github.com/giantswarm/happa/pull/4691

## New Contributors
* @weatherhog made their first contribution in https://github.com/giantswarm/happa/pull/4684
